name: The Curbita Caper
description:
Curbita lives in the middle of a Halloween maze and doesn't like the kids intruding on her humble abode.  Help her find decorations in the mazes to ward off the coming hoard!

This game was made by:

Aaron Bowers - audio and music - https://aaronbowersaudio.itch.io/
Aiwlyss - Art - https://aiwlyss.itch.io/
Jason Lothamer - Programming - https://jlothamer.itch.io/
